goal.ch: 本課程旨在提供足夠的理論，使同學修完一年的課程之後，有能力學習更專業的幾何研究課程或將微分幾何應用在其他學科上。
goal.en:
“After this course is designed to provide sufficient theory to enable students to complete a one-year course, the ability to learn more specialized courses or geometric study of differential geometry will be applied to other disciplines.
Orientations, manifolds with boundary, integration on manifolds, de Rham theory, degrees, indices, and related topics.“

outline.ch:
“Orientations, manifolds with boundary, integration on manifolds, de Rham theory, degrees, indices,  Morse theory and related topics.
(Material from Ch.6 ＆ Ch.7 of the book ““An Introduction to Manifolds““, 2nd ed. by Loring W. Tu, and Ch.4~Ch.7 of the book ““An introduction to Differential Manifolds““ by Danis Barden ＆ Charles Thomas, and from Part I of of the book “Morse Theory“ by J. Milnor. )
Prerequisites: Some familiarity with material from Ch.1~3 ＆ Ch.5 of Tu‘s book ““An Introduction to Manifolds““, 2nd ed. (including manifolds, smooth maps on manifolds, tangent space and tangent bundle, bump functions and partition of unity, vector fields, differential forms, exterior derivative).“
